text: Chionanthus albidiflorus (syn. Linociera albidiflora (Thwaites) C.B.Clarke) is a species of flowering plant in the family Oleaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). Linociera albidiflora It is sometimes treated in the segregate genus Linociera, though this does not differ from Chionanthus in any character other than leaf persistence, not a taxonomically significant character.Flora of China: Chionanthus ==Culture== Known as "ඇබුල් හොර කහ - ambul hora kaha" in Sinhala. ==References== albidiflorus Category:Flora of Sri Lanka Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Chionanthus albidiflorus
